Entries.spouseRoom_Jasper: Good morning gorgeous. I've been up since dawn, too inspired to sleep.$1#$b#Why is it that epiphanies always come in the wee small hours?
Entries.Rainy_Day_0: Are you sure you must go out today, my love? We could do some baking, perhaps?#$b#I have been watching that Queen of Sauce show. She has proven most inspiring.$1
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: This autumn rain is rather dreary. Still, it sounds most musical on the roof.#$b#I feel today, perhaps, shall be a day to escape into a book.$3
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: Please my love, keep dry amd warm. I would hate for you to catch a chill.$2
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: You are not going to the mines today, are you my love?#$b#Please, do take care. Here, this might help. [349]
Entries.patio_Jasper: The autumnal colors are so beautiful, and the temperature is perfect.$1#$b#I could stand here all day and soak up nature.$3
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: Good evening, my love! A little something to sweeten up your day.[611]$1#$b#Not that you aren't already sweet enough!$4
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: I fear we have sprung a leak. I shall have to take a look at it tomorrow.$2
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: My love, you're freezing! Here, this'll warm you from the inside out.[236]$2#$b#Perhaps we could huddle beneath a blanket and read together?$3
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: I heard rustling in the night. I believe this cooler nights are bringing the rodents inside.$2#$b#I hope %pet is up for the task before them.$1
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: Good morning, @. I hope this shall be sufficient to help you through a busy day.[201 240 241 242]$3
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: My plans for today? Well, there's a new theory I'm pursuing...#$b#It won't make me famous, but it might help re-establish my career.$3
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: I was thinking of my goblin friend today. Oh, not like that, do not fret, @!$2#$b#I wonder if she is chieftain now? She was always so curious about the outside world.$1
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: Today was... not a good day, my love. It feels heavy. Ominous.$2#$b#Please, will you come to bed with me? I take such comfort in your company.$2
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: @, you're home! Is that the time? I was quite wrapped up in my research and lost track.$2#$b#Please forgive me, for I have not cooked you dinner.$2
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: Excellent news, @! My latest paper has been accepted for publication in {random: Cryptozoology Today, Journal of Uncommon Theories, The Unorthodox}.$1#$b#Yes, I know, not the prestigious publication I had hoped...but it's a beginning.$2#$b#And at least I know people read these!$3
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: The goblins celebrate Spirit's Eve too you know, but in a rather different manner to us!$3#$b#They tell the tales of their ancestors, with puppets woven from wood and fibre, and sing their praises on instruments made of bone.#$b#Spirit's Eve is about remembrance for them, not about hiding from the shadows.$1
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: Listen to the wind rattling the shutters and the boards that creak and moan...$2#$b#I am glad that you are here, @, to help me keep the shadows at bay.$4
Entries.Outdoor_1: When I was a kid, we would scramble over the cliffs, racing to fill our blackberry baskets.$3#$b#My mother was a wonderful baker; she made the most delicious pies.$1
Entries.Outdoor_0: The animals seem a little restless this morning. They can feel the chill in the air, the approach of winter.$2
Entries.Outdoor_2: The breeze is brisk this morning. Perhaps you should wear a coat?$2
Entries.Outdoor_3: Good morning @! Too many ideas, and roaming the farm, visiting the animals, it helps to clear my thoughts.#$b#Have a productive day, my love. I am sure I shall!$3
Entries.Outdoor_4: I could not sleep, @. I came out here, so as not to disturb you with my restlessness.#$b#Watching the sun rise over your farm... it is really most beautiful.#$b#Almost as beautiful as your smile.
Entries.funLeave_Jasper: I shall be visiting the library today, if you have any requests?
Entries.funReturn_Jasper: Oh @, the shadows lurk long, and the trees seem to whisper.$2#$b#I can sense the brush of the void. Winter is coming.$2
Entries.OneKid_0: %kid1 loves to play in the fallen leaves.#$b#I must confess, I am rather enjoying it myself.$4#$b#I feel young again, @. Reborn.$4
Entries.OneKid_1: Why yes... there is mashed pumpkin in my hair.$2#$b#I offered %kid1 some, pureed, for breakfast. They were not appreciative.
Entries.One_Kid_2: %kid1 and I have been skipping stones on the pond. My record is 5 hops.$1#$b#%kid1's is one plop, but it's early days yet.$3
Entries.TwoKids_0: %kid1 found a worm in the leaves today and told %kid2 it was 'piz-getti'.$2#$b#Do not fret, it was confiscated and safely liberated. No worms - or small children - harmed!$3
Entries.TwoKids_1: The kids and I have taken to painting rocks and hiding them around the village.#$b#Small steps, yes, but I shall make a geologist of at least one of them yet!
